Description

(Info goes here)

Float options

Float an element to the left or right with a class.

<div class="pull-left">...</div>
<div class="pull-right">...</div>

Example

Pulled right A

Pulled right B

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-4 pull-right">
		<div class="well">
			<p>Pulled right A</p>
		</div>
	</div>

	<div class="col-md-4 pull-right">
		<div class="well">
			<p>Pulled right B</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Clearing floats

Clear the float on any element with the clearfix class.

<div class="clearfix">...</div>

Example

Pulled right A

Pulled right B

<div class="row">
	<div class="col-md-4 pull-right">
		<div class="well">
			<p>Pulled right A</p>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="clearfix"></div>
	<div class="col-md-4 pull-right">
		<div class="well">
			<p>Pulled right B</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)
